Steps.Message: Update at 09:41 - Our engineers are still on site working to restore power. They originally believed the fault at the substation; however after further investigations they have discovered the fault is underground. At the moment, we don't need to change the estimated time. We're sorry you've been without power for a long time and we'll keep you updated with progress.

We became aware of a power cut at 02:08. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 09:41 - Our engineers are still on site working to restore power. They originally believed the fault at the substation; however after further investigations they have discovered the fault is underground. At the moment, we don't need to change the estimated time. We're sorry you've been without power for a long time and we'll keep you updated with progress.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
